title: Rasathi Pola Lyrics Avan Ivan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Haricharan
Song : Rasathi
MOvie : Avan Ivan
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar
Music Director : Yuvan Shankar Raja

Hey rasathi pola ava enna thaedi varuva
nan ketatha ellam tharuva tharuvaa
Rosa poo pola ava siricha pothum thalaiva
nan sethu poven medhuva medhuva

Adi aathi, en kannula,
sila naala, ava theriyala
verethum naa pakala, vaazhve ippa pidikalaÂ 
varuva ava varuva, enna thaalatta

rasathi pola ava enna thaedi varuva
nan ketatha ellam tharuva tharuvaa
Rosa poo pola ava siricha pothum thalaiva
nan sethu poven medhuva medhuva

Kaatu sirikiye kaatu sirikiye kaathu kidakuren vaadi
Nethu paathathu nenjil irukudhu enna kolluthe podi
kannu oduthe kannu oduthe kattu paata than meri
enna pannuven enna pannuven poda theriyala veli

Hey aanai naan vanthadum adi pennai nee vanthadum
engeyo mudivanathu
ennai nee paarthadum, adi unnai naan paarthadum
munjenma thodarbanathu
yaar vanthu thaduthalum, en vaazhvin ethirkalam neethanadi
kann moodi paduthalum, kanavellam neethane
iranthalum irakathathu, intha kaadhale
puriyathathu puthiranathu, azhinthalume azhiyathathu nilaiyanathu

[Kaatu sirikiye kaatu sirikiye kaathu kidakuren vaadi
Nethu paathathu nenjil irukudhu enna kolluthe podi
kannu oduthe kannu oduthe kattu paata than meri
enna pannuven enna pannuven poda theriyala veli] (2)
